QAPair.Question: What is (are) Osteomyelitis - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You or your child has osteomyelitis . This is a bone infection caused by bacteria or other germs. The infection may have started in another part of the body and spread to the bone. At home, follow the health care provider's instructions on self-care and how to treat the infection. Use the information below as a reminder.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Osteomyelitis - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Osteomyelitis - discharge ?
